nachos.vm

Class VMProcess

  • java.lang.Object
    • nachos.userprog.UserProcess
      • nachos.vm.VMProcess
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FilesysProcess, NetProcess

    public class VMProcess
extends UserProcess
    A UserProcess that supports demand-paging.
